markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Ooze Ammunition](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1900)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Acid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=3" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
**Ammunition** any

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Ooze ammunition is a capsule containing a sticky substance. If you hit a creature with activated ooze ammunition, it deals acid damage instead of its normal damage type, and the creature then takes the listed penalty to Speed and [persistent acid damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) until it ends the effects. On a critical hit, the creature is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) for 1 round in addition to the other effects. The target can end the effects by [Escaping](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) the sticky foam. Other creatures can provide the actions, although doing so deals half the ammunition's persistent acid damage to the assisting creature. A creature that ends the effect still takes the persistent damage that turn.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Limited"
>
Ooze Ammunition (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 1d4 persistent acid damage and imposes a –5-foot penalty to Speed, and the Escape DC is 16.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Limited"
>
Ooze Ammunition (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 42 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 2d4 persistent acid damage and imposes a –10-foot penalty to Speed, and the Escape DC is 20.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Limited"
>
Ooze Ammunition (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 350 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 3d4 persistent acid damage and imposes a –10-foot penalty to Speed, and the Escape DC is 29.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Limited"
>
Ooze Ammunition (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 43 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 3,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The ammunition deals 4d4 persistent acid damage and imposes a –15-foot penalty to Speed, and the Escape DC is 38.
name: Ooze Ammunition (Moderate)
